#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Several popular culture references are made in the book to illustrate your experiences .
#Text=You talk about the film Poltergeist and how your husband compared it to his experience of pulling you out of your psychosis ( p. 219 ) .

#Text=You reference the film The Omen as a way to describe L. Ron Hubbard 's view in a purported version of the Scientology level " OT 8 " that you read on the Internet , writing , " [ Hubbard ] said that he had his next mission lined up that was to come back in a healthy body and join politics - a modern-day Damien from The Omen . " ( p. 202 )

#Text=Scientology has itself been the subject of depictions in popular culture , for example the Obie Award-winning satirical musical A Very Merry Unauthorized Children 's Scientology Pageant , and the Emmy-nominated parody episode " Trapped in the Closet " by the comedy program South Park .
#Text=Have you seen any parodies or depictions of Scientology in popular culture ?
#Text=What are your thoughts about them ?
#Text=These were all great shows .
#Text=I went to the " Unauthorized Children ’s Scientology Pageant " , with my youngest son who had been through the roughest parts of my mental collapse with me , and we just laughed and laughed .

column1: #Text=It was so great .
#Text=If it ’s in your town , do n’t miss it .
#Text=The South Park episode was great .
#Text=I kept it on my replay for months so I could watch again with friends ( ex Scn or never Scn ) who had missed it .
#Text=I wish the public , especially America , would not be so star struck that they ignore the Human Rights Abuses happening within our own borders ... — Nancy Many
#Text=Do you have any thoughts or advice for others either curious to find out more information about Scientology or those seeking to leave the organization ?
#Text=If you are thinking about joining , stick to the internet for a while , a long while – they have their own websites , so you can see both sides .
#Text=For those seeking to leave the Sea Organization , just get up and walk out .
#Text=If they touch you you have a million dollar lawsuit – but how to get the information inside to you ? ? ? ?
#Text=Are there any other points regarding your experiences that you would like to elaborate on or explain ?
#Text=I wish the public , especially America , would not be so star struck that they ignore the Human Rights Abuses happening within our own borders , or just find it too had to believe .

#Text=A friend of mine told a famous actress my story , and she could n’t believe it , come to find out another friend of theirs had reported the same thing and they had simply thought she was delusional .
#Text=Nancy
#Text=Many , thank you for taking the time to participate in this interview with Wikinews .
